colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @055A *, ,(ZHES PA 'DI NI SKYABS MGON LHA MI'I 'DREN PA RGYAL MCHOG 'JAM DPAL RGYA MTSO'I SKU NA PHRA MO'I DUS SU DAD LDAN RNAMS KYIS RANG GI LHA DANG RGYUN RTEN KHA 'DON SOGS ZHU MKHAN RNAMS LA THUGS DAM BRTAG PA'I SGO NAS GSUNG CHOG PA 'DI LTA BU ZHIG GYIS ZHES, ^ YONGS 'DZIN KHRI RIN PO CHE NGAG DBANG CHOS GRAGS KYI GSUNG GIS BSKUL BA LTAR BKA' 'BANGS KYI THA SHAL LCAGS RA NGAG DBANG 'PHRIN LAS DPAL BZANG POS SUG BRIS SU BGYIS TE PHUL, ,SHO MO 'DEBS TSUL 'BRAS BSHAD DANG BCAS PA 'DI NI LUNG MA THOB PA DANG, SNOD MIN RNAMS LA GSANG BA GAL CHE BA YIN NO,, ,,AiTHI,, ,,)
